mapper.select: select interfaceInfoId, sum(totalNum) as totalNum from user_interface_info group by interfaceInfoId order by totalNum desc limit #{limit};
mapper.update: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_invoke_records ( user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, interface_info_id BIGINT NOT NULL, count INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, interface_info_id) )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO temp_invoke_records (user_id, interface_info_id, count) VALUES
(#{item.userId}, #{item.interfaceInfoId}, #{item.count})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_interface_info u JOIN temp_invoke_records t ON u.userId = t.user_id AND u.interfaceInfoId = t.interface_info_id SET u.leftNum = u.leftNum - t.count, u.totalNum = u.totalNum + t.count WHERE u.leftNum >= t.count
